Fabiola Larios

Internet Humans

Reflects on the current techno-political environment surrounding data-sensitivity and surveillance capitalism through the historical context of appropriation in contemporary art.

SelfieGAN

Reflects on the current self-representation on Instagram through selfies surrounding data-sensitivity and the use of hashtags to be engage a targeted audience.

Healing Profile Ritual
